00001 # Name:     completer.tcl
00002 # Author:   Trevor Williams  (phase1geo@gmail.com)
00003 # Date:     11/4/2014
00004 # Brief:    Contains namespace handling bracket/string completion.
00005 
00006 namespace eval completer {
00007   
00008   source [file join $::tke_dir lib ns.tcl]
00009 
00010   array set pref_complete    {}
00011   array set complete         {}
00012   array set lang_match_chars {}
00013 
00014   trace add variable [ns preferences]::prefs(Editor/AutoMatchChars) write [ns completer]::handle_auto_match_chars
00015   
00016   ######################################################################
00017   # Handles any changes to the Editor/AutoMatchChars preference value.
00018   proc handle_auto_match_chars {name1 name2 op} {
00019 
00020     variable pref_complete
00021     variable lang_match_chars
00022     
00023     # Populate the pref_complete array with the values from the preferences file
00024     array set pref_complete {
00025       square 0
00026       curly  0
00027       angled 0
00028       paren  0
00029       double 0
00030       single 0
00031     }
00032     
00033     foreach value [[ns preferences]::get Editor/AutoMatchChars] {
00034       set pref_complete($value) 1
00035     }
00036 
00037     # Update all text widgets
00038     foreach txt [array names lang_match_chars] {
00039       set_auto_match_chars $txt $lang_match_chars($txt)
00040     }
00041 
00042   }
00043   
00044   ######################################################################
00045   # Sets the auto-match characters based on the current language.
00046   proc set_auto_match_chars {txt matchchars} {
00047     
00048     variable lang_match_chars
00049     variable pref_complete
00050     variable complete
00051     
00052     # Save the language-specific match characters
00053     set lang_match_chars($txt) $matchchars
00054     
00055     # Initialize the complete array for the given text widget
00056     array set complete [list \
00057       $txt,square 0 \
00058       $txt,curly  0 \
00059       $txt,angled 0 \
00060       $txt,paren  0 \
00061       $txt,double 0 \
00062       $txt,single 0 \
00063     ]
00064       
00065     # Combine the language-specific match chars with preference chars
00066     foreach match_char $lang_match_chars($txt) {
00067       if {$pref_complete($match_char)} {
00068         set complete($txt,$match_char) 1
00069       }
00070     }
00071       
00072   }
00073  
00074   ######################################################################
00075   # Adds bindings to the given text widget.
00076   proc add_bindings {txt} {
00077     
00078     bind comp$txt <Key-bracketleft>  "[ns completer]::add_square %W left"
00079     bind comp$txt <Key-bracketright> "if {\[[ns completer]::add_square %W right\]} { break }"
00080     bind comp$txt <Key-braceleft>    "[ns completer]::add_curly %W left"
00081     bind comp$txt <Key-braceright>   "if {\[[ns completer]::add_curly %W right\]} { break }"
00082     bind comp$txt <Key-less>         "[ns completer]::add_angled %W left"
00083     bind comp$txt <Key-greater>      "if {\[[ns completer]::add_angled %W right\]} { break }"
00084     bind comp$txt <Key-parenleft>    "[ns completer]::add_paren %W left"
00085     bind comp$txt <Key-parenright>   "if {\[[ns completer]::add_paren %W right\]} { break }"
00086     bind comp$txt <Key-quotedbl>     "if {\[[ns completer]::add_double %W\]} { break }"
00087     bind comp$txt <Key-quoteright>   "if {\[[ns completer]::add_single %W\]} { break }"
00088     bind comp$txt <BackSpace>        "[ns completer]::handle_delete %W"
00089     
00090     # Add the bindings
00091     set text_index [lsearch [bindtags $txt.t] Text]
00092     bindtags $txt.t [linsert [bindtags $txt.t] $text_index comp$txt]
00093     
00094     # Make sure that the complete array is initialized for the text widget
00095     # in case there is no language
00096     set_auto_match_chars $txt.t {}
00097       
00098   }
00099   
00100   ######################################################################
00101   # Returns true if a closing character should be automatically added.
00102   proc add_closing {txt} {
00103     
00104     # Get the character at the insertion cursor
00105     set ch [$txt get insert]
00106     
00107     if {[string is space $ch] || ($ch eq "\}") || ($ch eq "\)") || ($ch eq ">") || ($ch eq "]")} {
00108       return 1
00109     }
00110     
00111     return 0
00112     
00113   }
00114   
00115   ######################################################################
00116   # Handles a square bracket.
00117   proc add_square {txt side} {
00118     
00119     variable complete
00120 
00121     if {$complete($txt,square) && ![ctext::inCommentString $txt insert]} {
00122       if {$side eq "right"} {
00123         if {[$txt get insert] eq "\]"} {
00124           $txt mark set insert "insert+1c"
00125           return 1
00126         }
00127       } else {
00128         set ins [$txt index insert]
00129         if {[add_closing $txt]} {
00130           $txt insert insert "\]"
00131         }
00132         $txt mark set insert $ins
00133       }
00134     }
00135     
00136     return 0
00137     
00138   }
00139   
00140   ######################################################################
00141   # Handles a curly bracket.
00142   proc add_curly {txt side} {
00143 
00144     variable complete
00145     
00146     if {$complete($txt,curly) && ![ctext::inCommentString $txt insert]} {
00147       if {$side eq "right"} {
00148         if {[$txt get insert] eq "\}"} {
00149           $txt mark set insert "insert+1c"
00150           return 1
00151         }
00152       } else {
00153         set ins [$txt index insert]
00154         if {[add_closing $txt]} {
00155           $txt insert insert "\}"
00156         }
00157         $txt mark set insert $ins
00158       }
00159     }
00160 
00161     return 0
00162 
00163   }
00164   
00165   ######################################################################
00166   # Handles an angled bracket.
00167   proc add_angled {txt side} {
00168 
00169     variable complete
00170     
00171     if {$complete($txt,angled) && ![ctext::inCommentString $txt insert]} {
00172       if {$side eq "right"} {
00173         if {[$txt get insert] eq ">"} {
00174           $txt mark set insert "insert+1c"
00175           return 1
00176         }
00177       } else {
00178         set ins [$txt index insert]
00179         if {[add_closing $txt]} {
00180           $txt insert insert ">"
00181         }
00182         $txt mark set insert $ins
00183       }
00184     }
00185 
00186     return 0
00187     
00188   }
00189   
00190   ######################################################################
00191   # Handles a parenthesis.
00192   proc add_paren {txt side} {
00193 
00194     variable complete
00195     
00196     if {$complete($txt,paren) && ![ctext::inCommentString $txt insert]} {
00197       if {$side eq "right"} {
00198         if {[$txt get insert] eq ")"} {
00199           $txt mark set insert "insert+1c"
00200           return 1
00201         }
00202       } else {
00203         set ins [$txt index insert]
00204         if {[add_closing $txt]} {
00205           $txt insert insert ")"
00206         }
00207         $txt mark set insert $ins
00208       }
00209     }
00210     
00211     return 0
00212 
00213   }
00214   
00215   ######################################################################
00216   # Handles a double-quote character.
00217   proc add_double {txt} {
00218 
00219     variable complete
00220 
00221     if {$complete($txt,double)} {
00222       if {[ctext::inCommentString $txt insert]} {
00223         if {[$txt get insert] eq "\""} {
00224           $txt mark set insert "insert+1c"
00225           return 1
00226         }
00227       } else {
00228         set ins [$txt index insert]
00229         $txt insert insert "\""
00230         $txt mark set insert $ins
00231       }
00232     }
00233 
00234     return 0
00235     
00236   }
00237   
00238   ######################################################################
00239   # Handles a single-quote character.
00240   proc add_single {txt} {
00241 
00242     variable complete
00243 
00244     if {$complete($txt,single)} {
00245       if {[ctext::inCommentString $txt insert]} {
00246         if {[$txt get insert] eq "'"} {
00247           $txt mark set insert "insert+1c"
00248           return 1
00249         }
00250       } else {
00251         set ins [$txt index insert]
00252         $txt insert insert "'"
00253         $txt mark set insert $ins
00254       }
00255     }
00256 
00257     return 0
00258 
00259   }
00260 
00261   ######################################################################
00262   # Handles a deletion.
00263   proc handle_delete {txt} {
00264 
00265     variable complete
00266 
00267     if {![ctext::inCommentString $txt insert-2c]} {
00268       switch [$txt get insert-1c insert+1c] {
00269         "\[\]" {
00270           if {$complete($txt,square)} {
00271             $txt delete insert
00272           }
00273         }
00274         "\{\}" {
00275           if {$complete($txt,curly)} {
00276            $txt delete insert
00277           }
00278         }
00279         "<>" {
00280           if {$complete($txt,angled)} {
00281             $txt delete insert
00282           }
00283         }
00284         "()" {
00285           if {$complete($txt,paren)} {
00286             $txt delete insert
00287           }
00288         }
00289         "\"\"" {
00290           if {$complete($txt,double)} {
00291             $txt delete insert
00292           }
00293         }
00294         "''" {
00295           if {$complete($txt,single)} {
00296             $txt delete insert
00297           }
00298         }
00299       }
00300     }
00301 
00302   }
00303   
00304 }
